text:
e="preserve">Hakan Cakil (born 23 September 1964 in Ankara, Turkey) He is a Turkish politician, ambassador at the Turkish Embassy in Lebanon.
Biography.
He worked in the Ministry of Foreign Affairs in 1990, assumed various duties.
Hakan held the position of Senior Adviser for Cyprus Affairs between 2011 and 2015, and served as the Ambassador of Turkey to Nigeria between 2015 and 2018, and Become Ambassador to Beirut on July 4, 2018.
